titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund be excluded from the Federal budget.
To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund be excluded from the Federal budget.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: Excludes the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund from the Federal and congressional budgets and exempts it from any general budget limitation imposed by statute on U.S. budget outlays.
